original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3361)@</color>蓄力揮砍，對前方施展出巨型十字型劍氣攻擊，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3361)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3361)@</color> charged with slashing, cast a giant cross-shaped sword attack on the front, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3361)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
